org.princehouse.mica.base.net.model

Interface Address

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Address>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyAddress, SimAddress, TCPAddress

    public interface Address
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Address>
    Interface representing the general concept of an Address. See TCPAddress for a TCP/IP specific address.

    • Method Summary

      Methods
